short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides the user with a simple menu to quickly and efficiently manage every group.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indeed! With this extension, you can manage every group and tab. It is made to be user friendly and efficient. Comes in handy when dealing with a lot of tabs or even for daily use.

Excerpt of some of the overall features : 
Easily create / delete groups  and  group / ungroup tabs. Modify many group / tab properties and more.

You can open the group manager extension quickly by using the key shortcut: Ctrl+Shift+Z

& Updates Log :

Update (v1.0 alpha): First extension version!

Update (v1.1 alpha): Small bug fixes
